entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with a few flurries. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 late this evening then diminishing to 20 overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then light snow. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
